attributes.action: Free parking & accommodation in UK cities for NHS workers during COVID-19 crisis
attributes.additional_details: So we can continue to sustain key NHS services and work safely, minimising risk to patients and each other.
attributes.background: We in the NHS are willing to fight this COVID-19 crisis head on. However in major cities it's hard and risky to get around. Our priority is to stay virus free and continue working. Free parking and a place to stay if members of our household need to self isolate would make this much easier.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to fund the provision of temporary accommodation for NHS staff during the coronavirus oubtreak.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
